text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Holy cow. Your campaign briefings are a dumpster fire on a good day. This one was a doozy. I think you’re losing it, sir. You are incompetent and your response to COVID-19 has been impotent. It must be frustrating to be such a loser in comparison to W Bush let alone Obama.
